snippet: In his final news conference of the season, the Jets' coach defended Mark Sanchez but seemed to suggest that no one on the team should feel safe.
abstract: In his final news conference of the season, the Jets' coach defended Mark Sanchez but seemed to suggest that no one on the team should feel safe.
lead_paragraph: You're invited to read between the lines of Rex Ryan's final postgame news conference of the 2011 season on Sunday. You can read the real lines, too.
